question: how do you get over derealization?
question_content:
these are my symptoms, first i would like to say this all started after a panic attack scare due to marijuana since then i've quit and now a year later i have derealization and anxiety i'm 17.

-no motivation to even do school work.

-everything feels dreamlike.

-suicidal thoughts everyday.

-no motivation to take care of my hygiene.

-don't feel connected with the world.

-hopeless,helpless, and worthless.

-lost interest in life and old hobbies.

-loss of friends.

-trapped in the house only go out for p.o.

-paranoid.

i feel dreamlike 24/7 and it never goes away, i wake up feeling empty, i have no motivation to do anything anymore, i use to have hopes and dreams now life doesnt mean anything to me,i feel lightheaded. what do i do? any suggestions what medication would work for me?

answers.answer_content:
Thats really bad for you.
It would be better, if you ask a doctor.
Best wishes!
